stack_features.name: secure_zookeeper
stack_features.description: Protect ZNodes with SASL acl in secure clusters

stack_features.name: timeline_state_store
stack_features.description: Yarn application timeline-service supports state store property (AMBARI-11442)

stack_features.name: hbase_home_directory
stack_features.description: Hbase home directory in HDFS needed for HBASE backup

stack_features.name: nifi_encrypt_config
stack_features.description: Encrypt sensitive properties written to nifi property file

stack_features.description: Support separate input and output for toolkit configuration

stack_features.name: nifi_jaas_conf_create
stack_features.description: Create NIFI jaas configuration when kerberos is enabled

stack_features.name: nifi_encrypted_authorizers_config
stack_features.description: Support encrypted authorizers.xml configuration for version 3.1 onwards
